mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_vt_application( id, application_status, vt_id, member_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{applicationStatus}, #{vtId}, #{memberId} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, p.created_date AS applicationDate, a.application_status AS applicationStatus, a.vt_id AS vtId, a.member_id AS memberId FROM tbl_vt_application a JOIN tbl_vt v ON a.vt_id = v.id JOIN tbl_post p ON v.id = p.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, p.created_date AS applicationDate, a.application_status AS applicationStatus, a.vt_id AS vtId, a.member_id AS memberId FROM tbl_vt_application a JOIN tbl_vt v ON a.vt_id = v.id JOIN tbl_post p ON v.id = p.id

SELECT a.id, p.created_date AS applicationDate, a.application_status AS applicationStatus, a.vt_id AS vtId, a.member_id AS memberId FROM tbl_vt_application a JOIN tbl_vt v ON a.vt_id = v.id JOIN tbl_post p ON v.id = p.id WHERE a.vt_id = #{vtId} ORDER BY p.created_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_vt_application WHERE vt_id = #{vtId}

SELECT a.id, p.created_date AS applicationDate, p.post_title, a.application_status AS applicationStatus, a.vt_id AS vtId, a.member_id AS memberId, m.member_name AS memberName FROM tbl_vt_application a JOIN tbl_vt v ON a.vt_id = v.id JOIN tbl_post p ON v.id = p.id JOIN tbl_member m ON a.member_id = m.id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} + INTERVAL '1' DAY ORDER BY p.created_date DESC

SELECT a.id, p.created_date AS applicationDate, p.post_title, a.application_status, a.vt_id, a.member_id, m.member_name FROM tbl_vt_application a JOIN tbl_vt v ON a.vt_id = v.id JOIN tbl_post p ON v.id = p.id JOIN tbl_member m ON a.member_id = m.id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY p.created_date DESC
